abstract: As it prepares to cleave itself in two, Citigroup has again reshuffled its management, as the staggering financial giant strives to crawl out from under crushing multibillion-dollar losses.
lead_paragraph: As it prepares to cleave itself in two, Citigroup has again reshuffled its management, as the staggering financial giant strives to crawl out from under crushing multibillion-dollar losses.

headline.main: Citi Reshuffles Its Management as Split Looms
